item.title: 'Under Ninja' Announces Additional Cast
item.description: The official website for the television anime adaptation of Kengo Hanazawa's Under Ninja manga announced four additional cast members on Thursday. The anime is scheduled to premiere in October 2023 on TBS and other channels. Cast Kawado: Chika Anzai (Grand Blue) Ono: Cho (Great Teacher Onizuka) Eita: Shuuichi Uchida (Fuufu Ijou, Koibito Miman.) Noguchi: Sora Tokui (Love Live! School Idol Project) Satoshi Kuwahara (5-toubun no Hanayome) is helming the anime at Tezuka Productions. Keiichirou...

item.title: 'Majo to Yajuu' Reveals Main Cast, Staff, Teaser Promo, Winter 2024 Premiere
item.description: Television channel TBS opened an official website for the Majo to Yajuu (The Witch and the Beast) television anime series on Thursday. The website revealed the main cast, staff, teaser visual (pictured), and a teaser promotional video on Thursday. The anime is scheduled to premiere on January 2024 on TBS and BS11. You Taichi (Princess Principal) and Toshiyuki Morikawa (JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 4: Diamond wa Kudakenai) are starring as Guideau and Ashaf, respectively. Takayuki Hamana (Arte, M...

item.title: 'Bikkurimen' Reveals Cast, Additional Staff, Second Promo
item.description: The official website of the Bikkurimen television anime revealed the cast, additional staff, and a second promotional video on Thursday. The anime is scheduled to premiere in Fall 2023. Cast Yamato: Daishi Kajita (Blue Lock) Ushiwaka: Shuuta Morishima (Argonavis from BanG Dream!) Jack: Tatsumaru Tachibana (The God of High School) Phoenix: Souma Saitou (Yuukoku no Moriarty) Maris: Katsuyuki Konishi (Prison School) Hood: Youhei Azakami (Kidou Senshi Gundam: Suisei no Majo) Peter: Yuuki Sakakibara...

item.title: 'Tsuki ga Michibiku Isekai Douchuu' Season 2 Reveals Winter 2024 Premiere, 2 Consecutive Cours
item.description: The official website for the Tsuki ga Michibiku Isekai Douchuu (Tsukimichi -Moonlit Fantasy-) television anime revealed the staff, returning cast, a teaser promo, and teaser visual (pictured) for the second season on Thursday. The new season will air in two consecutive cours beginning January 2024. The main cast, composed of Natsuki Hanae, Ayane Sakura, Akari Kitou, and Kenjirou Tsuda, are reprising their roles from the first season. Shinji Ishihara (Tensei shitara Ken deshita) is returning to h...

item.title: 'Alice to Therese no Maboroshi Koujou' Unveils Supporting Cast
item.description: The official website for the Alice to Therese no Maboroshi Koujou (Maboroshi) original anime movie revealed nine supporting cast members on Thursday. The movie will open in theaters in Japan on September 15. Cast Daisuke Sasakura: Taku Yashiro (Horimiya) Atsushi Nitta: Tasuku Hatanaka (SK∞) Yasunari Senba: Daiki Kobayashi (Jibaku Shounen Hanako-kun) Yuuko Sonobe: Ayaka Saitou (Ouran Koukou Host Club) Hina Hara: Maki Kawase (Zombieland Saga) Reina Yasumi: Yukiyo Fujii (Sakasama no Patema) M...

item.title: Kodansha USA License Announcements at Anime Expo 2023
item.description: The Kodansha USA panel at Anime Expo 2023 announced the acquisition of 19 new titles and the print release for three existing licenses. In addition, the publisher also announced a third box set for Ijiranaide, Nagatoro-san (Don't Toy With Me, Miss Nagatoro) as well as the omnibus release for four titles. July 2023 Digital Licenses Boku no Okusan wa Chotto Kowai by Aguri Kurita English title: My Wife is a Little Intimidating Release date: July 4, 2023 Teppuu by Moare Ohta English title: Tepp...

item.title: 'Undead Girl Murder Farce' Unveils Additional Cast
item.description: The official website of the Undead Girl Murder Farce television anime series revealed on Tuesday additional cast and a new visual for the Vampire arc (pictured). The anime premiered on July 6 at 12:55 a.m. on Fuji TV's +Ultra programming block. Cast Lord Godard: Hiroyuki Kinoshita (Ajin) Claude: Hirofumi Nojima (Pandora Hearts) Raoul: Shouya Chiba (86) Charlotte: Afumi Hashi (Uma Musume: Pretty Derby) Alfred: Ryo Nishizawa Giselle: Ai Fukada (Cuticle Tantei Inaba) Marc: Mitsuru Hofu Mamoru...

item.title: 'Madogiwa no Totto-chan' Unveils Lead Cast, Trailer, December 8 Opening
item.description: The official website of the anime movie adapting Tetsuko Kuroyanagi's Madogiwa no Totto-chan (Totto-chan: The Little Girl at the Window) autobiographical novel revealed the lead cast, a trailer, and teaser visual (pictured) on Tuesday. Liliana Oono is starring as the main character Totto-chan after winning an audition. The movie will premiere in theaters in Japan on December 8. Staff Director: Shinnosuke Yakuwa (Doraemon Movie 34 & 36) Script: Shinnosuke Yakuwa, Yousuke Suzuki Character...

item.title: 'Kaii to Otome to Kamikakushi' Unveils Main Cast, 2024 Premiere
item.description: The official website for the television anime adaptation of Nujima's Kaii to Otome to Kamikakushi (Mysteries, Maidens and Mysterious Disappearances) manga revealed on Monday the main pair of cast. The anime is scheduled to premiere in 2024. Sumireko Ogawa: Ai Fairouz (Chainsaw Man, JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 6: Stone Ocean) Ren Adashino: Daiki Yamashita (Boku no Hero Academia, JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 5: Ougon no Kaze) Nujima began drawing the mystery supernatural manga on Shogakuka...

item.title: 'Keikenzumi na Kimi to, Keiken Zero na Ore ga, Otsukiai suru Hanashi.' Unveils Additional Cast, Theme Songs, First Promo, Fall 2023 Premiere
item.description: The official website of the Keikenzumi na Kimi to, Keiken Zero na Ore ga, Otsukiai suru Hanashi. (Our Dating Story: The Experienced You and The Inexperienced Me) television anime unveiled additional cast members, theme songs, the first promo, and a new visual (pictured) on Sunday. The anime is set to air in October 2023. item.title: Manga 'The Fable' Gets TV Anime
item.description: Production company VAP opened an official website for a television anime adaptation of Katsuhisa Minami's The Fable manga on Monday. The website also revealed the main staff and a teaser visual (pictured). Staff Director: Ryousuke Takahashi (Gasaraki, Hi no Tori) Series Composition: Yuuya Takashima Script: Yuuya Takashima, Mayumi Morita (Kanojo mo Kanojo, Young Black Jack) Character Design: Kyuuma Ooshita (Top Secret: The Revelation, Rocket Girls), Saki Hasegawa (Ao Ashi, Shin Chuuka Ichiba...

item.title: 'Yuru Camp△' Season 3 Reveals Main Staff, Returning Cast, 2024 Premiere
item.description: The official website of the Yuru Camp△ television anime series revealed on Sunday the main staff, returning cast, and a teaser visual (pictured) for the third season. The anime is scheduled to premiere in 2024. Staff Director: Shin Tosaka (IS: Infinite Stratos 2, Regalia: The Three Sacred Stars) Series Composition: Masafumi Sugiura (Uma Musume: Pretty Derby, Barakamon) Character Design: Takanori Hashimoto (Kitsutsuki Tanteidokoro main animator, Nakitai Watashi wa Neko wo Kaburu animation directo...

item.title: Original TV Anime 'Bokura no Ameiro Protocol' Announced for Fall 2023
item.description: An official website opened for an original television anime titled Bokura no Ameiro Protocol (Our Rainy Protocol) on Saturday, revealing the main cast, staff, teaser visual (pictured), and teaser promotional video. The anime is scheduled to premiere on TV Asahi's 24 affiliated channels on the NUMAnimation programming block, followed by Miyazaki Broadcasting and BS Asahi in October 2023. Synopsis Shun Tokinoya is a second-year high school student who lives with his mother and younger sister....

item.title: 'Shangri-La Frontier: Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su' Reveals Additional Staff, Second Promo
item.description: The official website of the Shangri-La Frontier: Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su television anime revealed additional staff and a second promo on Friday. The anime will have two consecutive cours scheduled to premiere in October 2023 at 5:00 p.m. on Sunday on MBS and TBS' 28 affiliated stations. Staff Monster Design: Yoshihiro Nagamori (Bakugan Battle Brawlers character design), Hiroyuki Taiga (Elfen Lied mechanical design), Emi Kouno (Majo no Tabitabi chief animation director), Hiro...

item.title: 'Watashi no Shiawase na Kekkon' Receives OVA Episode in Winter 2024
item.description: The official website of the Watashi no Shiawase na Kekkon (My Happy Marriage) television anime announced on Friday that the anime will receive an original video anime episode, titled Watashi no Shiawase na Katachi. The new original episode will be released as a bundle with the eighth light novel volume in March 2024. Produced by Kinema Citrus, the television anime began airing in Summer 2023. Netflix simulcast the anime worldwide. The television anime adapts Akumi Agitogi's historical drama...

item.title: Manga 'Kekkon suru tte, Hontou desu ka' Gets TV Anime
item.description: An official website for a television anime adaptation of Tamiki Wakaki's Kekkon suru tte, Hontou desu ka (365 Days to the Wedding) manga opened on Friday. Wakaki began serializing the workplace romance manga in Big Comic Spirits magazine in March 2020 and ended on June 12. Shogakukan shipped the 10th volume on April 12. The 11th and final volume is scheduled to release on July 12. Seven Seas Entertainment licensed the manga in English on February 8. The first volume will go on sale on Nove...

item.title: Light Novel 'Henjin no Salad Bowl' Gets TV Anime
item.description: A television anime adaptation of Yomi Hirasaka's Henjin no Salad Bowl (Salad Bowl of Eccentrics) light novel has been announced on Thursday and revealed an illustration (pictured) to commemorate the announcement. Hirasaka began penning the fantasy comedy novel under the Shogakukan's Gagaga Bunko imprint in October 2021, with illustrations by Kantoku. Both previously worked together on the Imouto sae Ireba Ii. (A Sister's All You Need.) light novel. Shogakukan shipped the fourth vo...

item.title: Manga 'Yubisaki to Renren' Gets TV Anime for Winter 2024
item.description: An official website opened for a television anime adaptation of Suu Morishita's Yubisaki to Renren (A Sign of Affection) manga on Wednesday. The website also revealed the main cast, staff, teaser visual (pictured), and a teaser promotional video. The anime is scheduled to premiere in January 2024. Sumire Morohoshi (Yakusoku no Neverland) and Yuu Miyazaki (Haikyuu!! To the Top) are starring as Yuki Itose and Itsuomi Nagi, respectively. Staff Director, Storyboard: Yuuta Murano (Kakushigoto) S...

item.title: 'Kikansha no Mahou wa Tokubetsu desu' Unveils Production Staff, Additional Cast, First Promo, Fall 2023 Premiere
item.description: The Crunchyroll Industry panel at Anime Expo 2023 revealed on Monday the production staff, additional cast, opening theme, and first promo for the television anime adaptation of Yu So-nan and Uk-jakga's Kikansha no Mahou wa Tokubetsu desu (A Returner's Magic Should Be Special) manhwa. The anime is scheduled to premiere in October 2023. Sayumi Suzushiro (Bocchi the Rock!) and Natsumi Fujiwara (Great Pretender) are joining the cast as Romantica Eru and Pram Schneider, respectively. Staff...
